title: Some dude reviews all the stuff his ex-girlfriends made him buy and then broke up with him before using said items
author: lolalodge

comments.author: king_alf_the_second
comments.body: some one needs to school this man on std's.

comments.author: D3lta105
comments.body: If you look at the last picture, he still hasn't thrown that toothbrush away.

comments.author: dsmly
comments.body: Why would you not use sugar?

comments.author: Irrepressible87
comments.body: I notice that aside from the chairs, he basically preemptively bought these things himself, then blames the girls. Maybe he should wait before investing in things?

comments.author: Website_Mirror_Bot
comments.body:
Hello! I'm a bot who mirrors websites if they go down due to being posted on reddit.

comments.author: Nolite_Te_Bastardes
comments.body: I love that the condoms are above his Christian book collection.

comments.author: flippant_gibberish
comments.body: HeadOn is just homeopathic wax, I wouldn't worry about any chemicals.

comments.author: kovani
comments.body: ah man... the Grey's anatomy soundtrack? I am so very, very sorry.

comments.author: TinyBoobsFlatAss
comments.body: I would really like to hear the argument that caused him to buy a greys anatomy soundtrack
